description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Lamb Cutlets with Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Lamb,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Sesame free,Potato
name: Chargrilled Lamb Cutlets with Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup basil, leaves removed from the stem
1 tsp sea salt (extra salt needed for seasoning)

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, add garlic,salt, pine nuts, basil and 2 tbs of the oil and process until it makes a thick paste.
Stir in parmesan and the remaining oil to make a thin dressing.

Season cutlets with salt and pepper and barbecue or panfry for 2 mins each side (or longer if they are thick) until well browned but still pink in the middle. Serve cutlets with potatoes and beans. Drizzle over some of the pesto dressing.
